event.title: entered the written history of China around 350 BC

data.event: It entered the written history of China around 350 BC, when under the kings of the Zhou Dynasty, it became part of the State of Chu.

event.title: conquered the Chu heartland in 278 BC

data.event: After Qin conquered the Chu heartland in 278 BC, the region came under the control of Qin, and then the Han dynasty.

event.title: this time, and for hundreds of years

data.event: At this time, and for hundreds of years thereafter, it was a magnet for migration of Han Chinese from the north, who displaced or assimilated the indigenous people, cleared forests and began farming rice in the valleys and plains.

event.title: this day many of the small villages in Hunan are named

data.event: To this day many of the small villages in Hunan are named after the Han families who settled there.
